description: This file defines the MenuScreen component for a restaurant menu and ordering app. It manages displaying menu items, refreshing data from an external service, and shows a cart summary with options to checkout.

methods.name: MenuScreen
methods.description: Main React component rendering the menu screen, fetching menu data, displaying list of items, and showing cart summary.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch menu data and update the component state.
